name: Sami Reindeer Hide | LIGHT
description: Our reindeer hides are hand-selected for their symmetry and patterning. Coloration These light hides have a predominately creamy white base color with secondary coloration in tones from grey and taupe through to caramel brown. Note that photos are for representation only - the hide you receive may differ slightly in coloration. Size 40-45" x 38-42" Eco-Friendly Our reindeer hides are sourced from the sustainable herds of the indigenous Lappish and Sami tribes of Finland and Sweden. Farmed for their milk and meat, their hides are a bi-product used for clothing and to keep warm in the winter. Their soft, silky hides make excellent throws, wall hangings and rugs. Note: A reindeer's hair is not as robust as that of the Icelandic sheep. They should not be used in high traffic areas or outdoors as this will cause them to shed hair over time. See the care section of our website found on the main page for more info.

name: Sami Reindeer Hide | DARK
description: Our reindeer hides are hand-selected for their symmetry and patterning. Coloration These darker hides range in tones from caramel to dark chocolat with natural patterning in greys and light brown. Note that photos are for representation only - the hide you receive may differ slightly in coloration. Size 40-45" x 38-42" Eco-Friendly Our reindeer hides are sourced from the sustainable herds of the indigenous Lappish and Sami tribes of Finland and Sweden. Farmed for their milk and meat, their hides are a bi-product used for clothing and to keep warm in the winter. Their soft, silky hides make excellent throws, wall hangings and rugs. Note: A reindeer's hair is not as robust as that of the Icelandic sheep. They should not be used in high traffic areas or outdoors as this will cause them to shed hair over time. See the care section of our website found on the main page for more info.

name: Large Gray Sheepskin GR-387
description: Coloration Gray is the rarest natural coloration. Shades range from silver to rust to charcoal. Size 42-45" x 32-34", the fur is ~4-8" long Note: Measurements are approximate, taken from the fur side. name: Sheepskin Brush
description:
Icelandic sheepskin wool is naturally curly and unruly. 

These brushes will help to straighten-it-out should you wish to maintain a more groomed appearance.

name: Large Brown Icelandic Sheepskin BR-001
description: Coloration Brown comes in a close second to grey in rareness. Coloration ranges from milk chocolate through to caramel. Size: 42-45" x 32-34", the fur is ~4-8" long Note: Measurements are approximate, taken from the fur side. Eco-Friendly The processing of these sheepskin conforms to strict EU directives concerning environmental preservation and protection — no chromium or bleaches were used in the tanning process. Actual product is shown in these images. To see images in situ, please visit our Tumblr

name: X-Large North American Buffalo Hide
description: REGULAR: $1,099 | SALE: $699 These huge North American Buffalo hides wear their winter coats - making them extra thick, soft and colourful. Coloration Varies from dark chocolate brown to caramel highlights. Size 72-78" x 72-78" Eco-Friendly Buffalo herds in North America are raised for their meat. Finding utility for these hides by tanning them for decorative application greatly reduces the waste associated with the meat production industry. No chromium is used in the tanning of these buffalo hides — all chemicals used in processing are EPA approved. All hides are bio-degradable. Cleaning and Re-Conditioning All hides come with lifetime cleaning and re-conditioning at no cost. Buyer is simply responsible for shipping and return shipping to the US tannery. Sample product is shown in these images, some natural variation may occur. To see images in situ, please visit our Tumblr

name: Large Black Icelandic Sheepskin
description: Coloration Color varies naturally from midnight black to rusty black. Size 45-51" x 30-38", the fur is ~4-8" long Note: Measurements are approximate, taken from the fur side. Eco-Friendly The processing of these sheepskin conforms to strict EU directives concerning environmental preservation and protection — no chromium or bleaches were used in the tanning process. name: Large White Icelandic Sheepskin
description: MANY IN STOCK Coloration Color varies naturally from snow white to white with shades of creams and grays (as shown in pic 3).. Size 45-51" x 30-38", the fur is ~4-8" long Note: Measurements are approximate, taken from the fur side. Eco-Friendly The processing of these sheepskin conforms to strict EU directives concerning environmental preservation and protection — no chromium or bleaches were used in the tanning process. Actual product is shown in these images. To see images in situ, please visit our Tumblr
